message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $160. I believe it's a fantastic deal and will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I think the product is worth less than $160 to me. Can you offer it at $140?
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I can come down a bit to $150.  I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product.
